translation_en: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami telah menurunkannya (Al-Qur’an) pada Lailatulqadar.

transliteration_en: Wa maa adraaka ma lailatul qadr
translation_en: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ ەۙ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ اَلْفِ شَهْرٍۗ
transliteration_en: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfee shahr
translation_en: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
translation_id: Lailatulqadar itu lebih baik daripada seribu bulan.

arabic: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةُ وَالرُّوْحُ فِيْهَا بِاِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْۚ مِنْ كُلِّ اَمْرٍۛ
transliteration_en: Tanaz zalul malaa-ikatu war roohu feeha bi izni-rab bihim min kulli amr
transliteration_id: Tanazzalul-malā'ikatu war rūḥu fīhā bi'iżni rabbihim min kulli amr(in).
translation_en: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
translation_id: Pada malam itu turun para malaikat dan Rūḥ (Jibril) dengan izin Tuhannya untuk mengatur semua urusan.

transliteration_en: Salaamun hiya hattaa mat la'il fajr
translation_en: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
